t: Amazon Brand Guidelines: Must-Know to Avoid Penalization
s: June 23, 2023 - Don't use unapproved colors. Don't outline the logo. Don't modify or recreate the provided artwork. Don't insert the logo in a sentence. Don't layer other content on the top or below the logo. Don't use the logo without the smile. Don't place the logo on a patterned background. Don't place a drop shadow behind the logo. ... Additionally, you must seek approval from the Amazon brand ...
